pages.name: DoGaBaKi Form
pages.text: Accessed by shift-clicking the $(l:kiva/items/wakeupfuestle)Wake Up,$(/l) $(l:kiva/items/garulufuestle)Garulu,$(/l) $(l:kiva/items/basshaafuestle)Basshaa,$(/l) or $(l:kiva/items/doggafuestle)Dogga Fuestle$(/l) with the other three in your inventory
